comprehensive_overview: OpenPGM is an open-source implementation of the Pragmatic General Multicast (PGM) protocol. PGM is a reliable and scalable multicast transport protocol that enables distributed applications to send data reliably to multiple receivers.
core_features: 1. Reliable and scalable multicast transport protocol. 2. Enables distributed applications to send data reliably to multiple receivers. 3. Open-source implementation for easy customization and integration.
